abstract: Dow Jones industrial average rises 102.55 points, or 0.9 percent, to 11,518.85; Standard & Poor's 500-stock index rises 11.71 points, or 1 percent, to 1,207.25; Nasdaq composite index rises 21.70 points, or 0.8 percent, to 2,604.73.
snippet: A plan was unveiled to recapitalize European banks, and a deal was struck that is expected to permit a larger euro zone bailout fund.
lead_paragraph: A plan was unveiled to recapitalize European banks, and a deal was struck that is expected to permit a larger euro zone bailout fund.

headline.main: Shares Are Bolstered by News From Europe
headline.print_headline: Shares Are Bolstered by News From Europe
